resources.string: An app for Rainbow Trout Fisheries Research Station

Background 
 
 Rainbow Trout Fisheries Station (RTFRS) was established in 2062 B.S. as Trout Genetic Resource Hatchery Sub-station at Dhunche on former abandoned horticulture farm under agriculture department of ministry of agriculture to Nepal Agriculture Research Council (NARC) and Fisheries Development directorate by using the cold water of Trisuli river through canal from Ghatte-khola to conduct research on rainbow trout and indigenous aquatic species. Since its establishment, this sub-station has worked on extending rainbow trout farming, improve hatchability and breeding of trout fulfill the demand of trout fingerlings and research on germpalsm maintenance of trout. With increasing trend in cold water fish farming at temperate region, this sub-station was developed as Agriculture Research Station (Fisheries) in 2072 Kartik 12 under Nepal Agriculture Research Council for technology generation through research on rainbow trout and cold water aquatic species. Later, in fiscal year 2072/73, this station was renamed as Rainbow Trout Fisheries Research Station. This station lies at Dhunche-8 of Rasuwa district at an altitude of approx. 1850 masl. 
 
 
 Goal 
 

Enhance livelihood and food security of the nation with increase in production and productivity of cold water aquatic species.

 
 
 Objectives 
 
 The overall objective of this station is to improve the general living condition of the farmers of Rasuwa district through increase in fisheries productivity. However the specific objective s are: 
 1. To conduct research on various aspects of rainbow trout and other aquatic species. 
 2. To increase the production and productivity of rainbow trout farming and other aquatic species. 
 3. To introduce, evaluate and promote productive aquatic species of temperature region 
 4. To develop sustainable aquaculture resource management and production technologies at temperate region. 
 
 
 Strategies 


 1. Identification and selection of appropriate techniques for rainbow trout farming and other aquatic species at temperate region 
 2. Research on aquaculture at temperate region 
 3. Verification of rainbow trout in temperate region

Rainbow Trout Fish 
 
 Requirements 
 
 1.Water quality and quantity

 Type: clean and cold 
 Temperature: 10 to 20 degree C 
 PH value: 6.5-8.0 
 Oxygen: above 8 mg/L 
 Water supply: 5 L/sec 
 
 
 2.Hatchery

 Compartment: 36* 35 cm 
 Height: 36+4 cm 
 Length: 215 cm 
 
 
 3.Ponds

 Shape: elongated rectangle 
 Made of: concrete and cement 
 Dimension: 4m* 0.9m*0.5m (depth 0.3 m) 
 Water capacity: 1 ton 
 Fry capacity: 15-20 thousand fry
